text: "Robert De Niro's Waiting..." is a 1984 song by Bananarama and taken from their second studio self-titled album. It namechecks American Robert De Niro. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Germany and South Africa and number 8 in Ireland and Switzerland. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Bananarama songs
title: Robert De Niro's Waiting...
